Roadmap

The long-term goal for the application is to become a full-featured bitcoin wallet with broad support across operating systems and devices, and works for both casual use and specialized use cases.

Internal versions

Milestone 1 will be a simple node runner for desktop and mobile Android.

Future milestones will work towards broader platform support and wallet features.

Created by Bitcoin Core and the Bitcoin Design Community
